culturalContext.description: Opening address calling to a boatman or companion named Khóa
facts: Cậu is informal address for younger males or those of equal/lower status
Khóa may be personal name or occupation (boatman/ferryman)
Ơi is vocative particle expressing emotion or calling for attention
culturalContext.musicalContext: Opening call establishes intimate, emotional tone of farewell

phrases.text: Cậu đưa tôi i ra đến bến a tàu
phrases.english: Please take me out to the boat dock

culturalContext.description: Request to be escorted to the boat dock for departure
facts: Bến tàu (boat dock) is departure point in river-based transportation
Melodic particles 'i' and 'a' add lyrical quality typical of Southern folk songs
Departure scenes at docks are common themes in Vietnamese folk music
culturalContext.musicalContext: Request phrase with melodic particles extending syllables for singing

culturalContext.description: Emotional gesture of wiping tears during farewell
facts: Physical gesture reveals emotional state during parting
Departure songs often describe physical manifestations of grief
culturalContext.musicalContext: Visual detail adds emotional weight to farewell scene

phrases.english: My hand holds the handkerchief hidden

culturalContext.description: Attempt to hide emotional display by concealing handkerchief
facts: Handkerchiefs used to wipe tears are common in Vietnamese departure scenes
Giấu (hide) suggests trying to maintain composure in public
Parallel structure with previous phrase emphasizes conflicting emotions
culturalContext.musicalContext: Second hand gesture parallels first, showing internal conflict

phrases.english: I invite you, dear, to share (betel/drink)

culturalContext.description: Traditional farewell gesture offering to share betel or drink
facts: Xơi often refers to sharing betel nut or rice wine at farewells
Mình (we/us) creates intimacy between speaker and addressee
Offering refreshment is ritual gesture of hospitality and bonding
culturalContext.musicalContext: Closing invitation softens farewell with gesture of shared moment
